🔍 Matchata: Simplify Language Learning with 🧠 AI-Powered Gameplay! 

Matchata, a Chrome extension, transforms language learning into a captivating adventure 🌟. Select any text on a webpage and watch as it creates a Duolingo-inspired word match madness game interface.

🌟 Why Use It:
1️⃣ Learn vocabulary in a fun and interactive way.
2️⃣ Reinforce your language skills while reading articles or browsing the web.
3️⃣ Benefit from AI-powered word extraction for accurate and relevant word pairs.
4️⃣ Improve vocabulary retention through gameplay and repetition.

🎯 Key Features:
1️⃣ Extracts only the most valuable words from selected text 
2️⃣ Generates word pairs based on the extracted words
3️⃣ Creates a Duolingo-like word match madness interface for interactive learning
4️⃣ Enhances vocabulary retention and makes language learning enjoyable
5️⃣ Compatible with any websites that can be opened in Chrome

🚀 How to Use:
1️⃣ Select any text on a webpage.
2️⃣ Right-click and choose "Play Matchata Game" from the context menu.
3️⃣ The extension will generate a linkable and shareable gameplay.
4️⃣ Once the word pairs are generated, the Matchata game interface appears.
5️⃣ Match the word pairs and improve your language skills!

💬 Get Support:
Matchata currently supports French and English languages. If you require additional features or languages, please send us a message. We're here to support your language learning journey!

📚 Start your Matchata adventure today and watch your language skills thrive! 🌟
